popText.text: Of course I wasn’t going to give Tom that list of addresses and I had to refuse his offer of money. But I’m going to keep this quiet because I don’t want Tom to get in trouble. Hopefully he’ll realize on his own that this isn’t appropriate.

revealCallOut.img: Tom: Caucasian male, late 30s, long hair in a ponytail or cropped, either one (same character in screen 18)

popText.text: Well, Emma wasn’t cooperative at all, but I still managed to get some addresses from someone else in her department.

Tom gets the addresses, follows a few of the high-profile clients, and then sells the pictures he takes. One celebrity whose information is compromised hires a private investigator and the images taken are traced back to Tom and the information he received as a Johnson Controls employee. Johnson Controls faces some adverse publicity and a possible investigation by the regulator for disclosing customers' personal information.

Tom and the employee who gave him the list are investigated and face disciplinary action up to and including dismissal. The investigators discover that Emma was aware of Tom’s actions, but failed to report it. She also has some explaining to do!
